name: qsv-fixlengths
description: Force a CSV to have same-length records by either padding or truncating them.

options.description: The field delimiter for reading CSV data. Must be a single character. (default: ,)
The escape character to use. When not specified, quotes are escaped by doubling them.

If empty fields need to be inserted, insert them at <pos>. If <pos> is zero, then it is inserted at the end of each record. If <pos> is negative, it is inserted from the END of each record going backwards. If <pos> is positive, it is inserted from the BEGINNING of each record going forward.
Forcefully set the length of each record. If a record is not the size given, then it is truncated or expanded as appropriate.
Write output to <file> instead of stdout.
